alert.note: Alert for Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 10:50PM EDT until August 24 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Chagrin River At Willoughby affecting Lake County. For the Chagrin River...including Willoughby...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chagrin River At Willoughby. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Property flooded in Trailard, Milann, and Chagrin Drives in Waite Hill. Riverside Drive and Boulevard in Eastlake cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 13.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning to 5.6 feet early Friday morning. It will rise to 5.7 feet Friday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.7 feet on 06/02/1947. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 900 AM EDT.
